description: A virtual assistant for customer service sample

values: We'll do our best to book you with @specialist
We only accept appointments between 11am and 5pm

output.text: What time on <? $date.reformatDateTime("EEEEE") ?> do you want to come in?

values: Our hours on <? @sys-date.reformatDateTime("EEEEE") ?> are 11am to 6pm.
Our hours are Monday to Friday 10am to 8pm and Friday and Saturday 11Am to 6pm.
We are open on @holiday regular hours
We are open on <? @sys-date.reformatDateTime("EEEEE") ?> from 10am until 8pm
We are closed on @holiday

output.text: OK. Let me know how I can help

values: OK. Transferring... [Use IBM Cloud Functions to connect to backend systems]
Looks like you're trying to make a reservation in the past. Try again.

output.text: What day would you like to come in?

values: To get to our business from the Empire State Building, walk to Herald Square and take the N train to Union Square
To get to our business from Times Square, take the 4,5 or 6 train downtown to Union Square.
To get to our business from Times Square, take the N train downtown to Union Square
We're located by Union Square on the corner of 13th and Broadway
Thanks

output.text: I'll just need a phone to hold your reservation

values: Sorry... let's try again
Perfect!

output.text: Let me confirm: You want an appointment for <? $date.reformatDateTime("EEEEE") ?> at <? $time.reformatDateTime("h a") ?>. Is this correct?

Hello, I’m a demo customer care virtual assistant to show you the basics.  I can help with directions to my store, hours of operation and booking an in-store appointment.   Look, I've changed!!
